H0.text: On which record label did Elvis Presley launch his career. RCA Victor

H1.text: On which record label did Elvis Presley launch his career. Capitol Records

H2.text: On which record label did Elvis Presley launch his career. Columbia Records

H3.text: On which record label did Elvis Presley launch his career. SUN

A4.text: Sun was the first label to record Elvis Presley.

A5.text: Presley's recording contract was eventually sold to RCA Victor for $40,000 (US$469,516 in 2024 dollars) in 1955 to relieve Sun's financial difficulties.
